docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [ dir - name ] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message. Project layout 1 2 3 4 mkdocs . yml # The configuration file . docs / index . md # The documentation homepage . ... # Other markdown pages , images and other files .
docs.title: nome_artefato

docs.text: Título Extensões do markdown: material extensions . Outros: note, abstract, info, sucess, question, warning, failure, danger, bug, example, quote. Note Exemplo de inserção de código : 1 2 3 4 5 6 """ Bubble sort """ def bubble_sort ( items ): for i in range ( len ( items )): for j in range ( len ( items ) - 1 - i ): if items [ j ] > items [ j + 1 ]: items [ j ], items [ j + 1 ] = items [ j + 1 ], items [ j ] Notas para o algoritmo: Bubble Sort 1 Parte legal importante no código: items [ j ], items [ j + 1 ] = items [ j + 1 ], items [ j ]; É possível colocar highlighting em partes importantes . Comentários inline TaskList: Exemplo 1; Exemplo 2; Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. ↩
